name: SRA Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct the more common ship hulls, weapons, and fighter LPCs from the Yardie school of design.

name: SRA Highgrade Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct more advanced ship hulls, weapons, and fighter LPCs from the Yardie school of design.

name: SRA Auxiliary Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct a variety of auxiliary ship hulls, weapons, and fighter LPCs from the Yardie school of design.

name: SRA Exports Package
desc: A set of common SRA plans modified to the specifications of the Persean League, uparmored and favoring a generally “midline” theory of design.
